thermoino._comment: +++ Values must be the same as in MMS. +++

stimuli._comment: +++ In psychopy, we still need to add np.random.randint(0, 3) to the iti_duration +++
stimuli._comment1: +++ We substract the correction if preexposure was painful to get a better vas70 estimate. +++

estimator._comment1: +++ trials_vas70 is the same as nReps in psychopy loop +++

estimator._comment3: +++ temp_start_vas0 will be based on vas70 estimation +++
